snippet: Under an agreement with a French regulator, the company will to make it easier for rivals to produce single-serving capsules for Nespresso machines.
abstract: Nestle, under an agreement with a French regulator, will make it easier for rivals to produce single-serving coffee capsules that can be used in Nespresso machines.
lead_paragraph: Under an agreement with a French regulator, the company will to make it easier for rivals to produce single-serving capsules for Nespresso machines.

headline.main: Nestlé Loses a Clash Over Single-Serve Coffee
headline.print_headline: Nestlé Loses Clash in France Over Single-Serve Coffee
